desc.cn: PostgreSQL 是一个功能强大的开源对象关系数据库系统
desc.en: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system

debian/apt.cmd:
sudo sh -c 'echo "deb https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt $(lsb_release -cs)-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list' \
&& wget --quiet -O - https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | sudo apt-key add - \
&& sudo apt-get update \
&& sudo apt-get -y install postgresql \
reference: https://www.postgresql.org/download/linux/debian/

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
sudo sh -c 'echo "deb https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt $(lsb_release -cs)-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list' \
&& wget --quiet -O - https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | sudo apt-key add - \
&& sudo apt-get update \
&& sudo apt-get -y install postgresql
reference: https://www.postgresql.org/download/linux/ubuntu/
